Name: Age Of Forays
About the game: Age of Forays is 2D pixel Action/RPG game The action of this game takes place in the era of chaos of the northern kingdom. You have to play for Oden, the only son of the deceased king. Oden goes on a journey to unknown islands to gain fame and recognition. On the islands, he faces not only the resistance of their inhabitants but also the keepers of these lands. The good news for you is that you can fight not alone but with your unit. Also you will be able to improve your ship, which will enhance the characteristics of your warriors for future raids. For the main character, it will be possible to improve his skill in melee and ranged combat and also purchase different costume jewelery to improve performance. Key Features: Improved ship Improving your combat units Commanding your units Exploring new attacks Craft jewelery
